name: John F. Kennedy Dr
description: A quiet stretch of John F. Kennedy Drive, where the only sound is a distant dog. You are on John F. Kennedy Dr. A dog barks in the distance, a lonely sound that echoes in the quiet afternoon. Otherwise, it is quiet, a stillness that borders on oppressive. John F. Kennedy Dr continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
